item.title: One PEP a Week
item.description: This is another of those attempts we think that will last for a long time, but has a huge potential of happening only once and never again. Anyway, here we go. One PEP a Week will be a personal project in which every week I’ll review one PEP that I find relevant, give some opinions on it and, hopefully, learn a lot. Please note that these posts will be filled with opinions and potential mistakes, so be kind on the feedbacks.

item.title: About
item.description: Who am I? Graduated from Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul in 2017 with a degree in Computer Science, I work in the IT industry since 2010. After a brief adventure in the technical support realm, I became a software developer and never left this world (and don’t plan to). During this journey, I had colleagues in the following companies: Valid SAP Dell Lakes Environmental Sindus ANDRITZ Hogarth Worldwide And today I’m a Consultant Developer at ThoughtWorks, working with IT infrastructure and devops.
